<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        f.readline()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> context, observation&#95;id, features, score</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
